message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a product that has the potential to revolutionize your life! I'm confident that you'll love it, and I'm willing to let it go for a steal at $10000. It's a one-time offer, so you have to make a decision quickly. What do you say? Will you take the chance and buy it?
I'll take the chance and buy it, hoping it's high-quality and worth $20000 to me.
